text: David Ossman (born December 6, 1936) is an American writer, actor and comedian. He was born in Santa Monica, California. He is best known as a member of the Firesign Theatre and screenwriter of such movies as Zachariah. He also voiced Cornelius in A Bug's Life. ==Filmography== ===Animated Roles=== * The Tick - Coach ===Film Roles=== * A Bug's Life - Cornelius ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television writers Category:Screenwriters from California Category:Movie directors from California Category:Movie producers from California Category:Comedians from Santa Monica, California Category:Actors from Santa Monica, California
title: David Ossman
